# [Interview #1121: Brandon Sanderson Book Signing at JordanCon 8, Entry #38](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1121#38)

#### Question

Has TenSoon ever left Scadrial?

#### Brandon Sanderson

More RAFO. I believe I have said there are Kandra on other worlds, but I have not said if one was TenSoon.
